trustfund:
TF030761-ITALIAN CTF (EE) FY06 - ECA
            (ALBANIA, AZERBAIJAN, BOSNIA-HERZEGOVINA, B,TF056728-PHRD-ALBANIA: AVIAN INFLUENZA
            CONTROL AND HUMAN PANDEMIC PREPAREDNESS A

abstracts.cdata!:
The Avian Influenza Control and Human
            Pandemic Preparedness and Response (APL) Project for Albania
            aims to strengthen the country's capacity to prevent
            the spread of avian influenza among poultry, to prevent the
            transmission of avian influenza from birds to other animals
            and humans, and to prepare for a potential pandemic of Avian
            Flu transmissible between humans. There are four project
            components. 1. Public Awareness and Information Campaign
            will include: a) risk communication; and b) communication
            for behavior change. This component will help develop and
            implement a communications plan to inform the public,
            particularly those more likely to be exposed to the Avian
            Flu, about its threat and how they can minimize the risk of
            transmission and spread of disease. 2. Animal Health
            Component will include: a) enhancing Avian Flu prevention
            and preparedness capability; b) strengthening Avian Flu
            control programs and outbreak containment programs; c)
            strengthening disease control capacities, and improving
            surveillance, diagnostic capacities, and applied research
            and will support a national program to develop and implement
            short- and long-term HPAI prevention, containment, and
            control and eradication activities in animals. 3. Human
            Health Component will include: a) enhancing coordination and
            program planning; b) strengthening national public health
            surveillance system; and c) strengthening health care
            response capacity. 4. Avian Influenza Task Force Component
            will support the Avian Influenza Task Force in implementing
            the government's Avian Flu response strategy (including
            components 1-3 above), and will comprise two subcomponents:
            a) strengthening the Task Force by establishing a permanent
            secretariat; and b) monitoring and evaluation.
